dataList.place: Atrio del Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: As soon as we got back to the lobby, we could see panic-struck employees run before Dongrang and Samjo.

dataList.title: Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: Mr. Dongrang... Mi ascolti, per favore...!

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Haha, sei diventato bianco come un cencio. Ah, scusatemi un secondo.
<The situation looks pretty tense. It's kinda awkward to stand still like this...>
As I meandered in the lobby murmuring meaningless things to myself, Don Quixote scuttled to a shelf.
Oho, what manner of books are these? The pictures glitter brightly!
Sounding a merry hum, she picked up a storybook.
I peeked at the book she opened.
Yi Sang also turned his gaze toward the book, possibly bothered by something about it...
Soon, a golden haze unfolded.
Once upon a time, when everyone had their heads down and eyes fixed on the ground, there was a person who looked up into the sky.
In their eyes were twinkling stars.
Connecting the nameless stars no one else would look at,
The person gave them names, and made up stories for them as they liked.
Stories are like skeins of thread without an end;
They're drawn and woven together in an effort to find meaning from meaninglessness.
All kinds of stories in the world, happy and sad, circled in the night sky.
Then one day, the person's family fell deeply sick, their life nearing its end.
Like any other day, the person spoke into the sky about the grief they felt.
And then...
A droplet of water fell onto the person's head.
Looking up, the person found the constellation talking to them.
'Dear person who named me and gave me a story, thanks to you, I was cast onto the land and pushed by the flow of time, feeling the world in full.'
'Did you know that stars can grant wishes?'
'The tears I shed will clear you of your pain.'
Afterwards, a rain fell onto the world for a day and a half.
Everyone caught in the rain was all healed up.
The person's ill family recovered to health, too.
Since then, the person and their family, as well as all the residents of the city, have looked up at the sky and talked about happiness every night.
That explains it. I read that Nest K has a custom of walking outside without an umbrella to stand in the rain on the night of a certain month every year...
...Don't tell me, am I alone in this again? Have none of you checked out the pamphlet guide to K Corp's Nest and Backstreets until now? No one?
Oh, that thing... I used mine to whack some bugs... So I gotta get a... new one...
Does this look like the time to be joking around, Rodya?!
Rodya didn't look like she was joking at all, but Ishmael seemed unaware of it.
By the way, that story... It feels similar to what the regeneration ampule does, doesn't it?
That rain that restores you to health...
Yeah, so... You trying to say it was made from rains dropped by stars?
Wait, wasn't it nanobots and not watery stuff in the first place?
<What do you think, Faust?>
I am a woman of science. I prefer judgement based on facts over metaphors.
This... so-called analysis and interpretation of stars and clouds might be an area Yi Sang is more familiar with.
He's a researcher like me, but we're not quite the same.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Faremmo meglio a sbrigarci. La situazione sembra davvero grave.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ho saputo che sono riusciti ad aprirsi un varco fino alle stanze in cui stiamo conducendo gli esperimenti.
Hmm? Does this place not seem too peaceful for such a dire predicament? I see nary a man running away!

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Si direbbe che sia stato diramato un ordine d'evacuazione. Ma come avete già potuto vedere, non è di certo la prima emergenza della settimana. Forse temono che un'altra evacuazione potrebbe ostacolare la politica aziendale delle 70 ore di lavoro settimanali.
<Working in this kind of place is not easy, huh...>
I don't get it. How was this attack possible? It didn't seem like a structure that allowed intruders to sneak into the room undetected.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Siamo a corto di tempo, quindi ve lo spiegherò mentre ci muoviamo.
Object.
Give one reason we should go with you.
Indeed. The contract has been fulfilled.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Non posso negarlo. Ma per quanto vorrei darvi il Ramo, ci è stato sottratto davanti agli occhi.
Hmgh... TRASHES...
Is this... really right? Hey... What does the contract exactly say?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Hm... Non posso rispondere con certezza, non sono così ferrato in questioni legali...
Instead of arguing back as usual, Samjo suddenly got busy wiping his glasses.
S.A.
Mister Samjo... She wants answers...

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Mm?
S-Samjo... She says she'll assail you this time...!
Wrong. I said I'll assail him right now.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Q-questa è un'emergenza, un'emergenza!!! Dovreste dirigervi al piano di sopra, presto!
<L-Let's hurry along for now, Ryōshū...>
I'll show SANGRIA... I swear it.
Samjo urgently sent us upstairs.

dataList.place: Corridoio Distrutto del Laboratorio di K Corp.
dataList.content: The hallway that was clean and calm hours ago...
Has now turned into complete mayhem, filled with screams and fleeing people.
A researcher was crying and clinging to someone who appeared to be a liberation alliance member.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Mi aiuti... Mr. Dongrang... la prego, mi salvi...

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Quel mio sottoposto... sta implorando di essere aiutato, potresti cortesemente lasciarlo andare?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Se sono informazioni che cerchi, te le fornirò. Avevamo organizzato una cena per i membri del personale domani, si tratta di un ristorante in cui servono una carne deliziosa.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Sarebbe davvero una disgrazia se l'odore che sentiremo domani provenisse dall'incenso di un funerale, piuttosto che dalla carne alla griglia. Non sei d'accordo?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Informazioni? Non ci servono più.
Huh, you're walking in unarmed now? What happened to your robots that did the fighting for you wimps?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Non abbiamo nemmeno più bisogno dei nostri robot.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Ne vedo di utili già presenti qui.
...Are you trying to...?

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Ci è stato ordinato di asportare i terroristi. Bersagli: tutte le parti.
Huff. We outnumber them by a wide margin. It might be a little unfair, but... it seems like we won't have any trouble beating them.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Il campo d'esperienza di Ms. Ran era manomettere le macchine.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Era molto più capace nell'hacking piuttosto che nel combattimento.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Benvenuti. Qui a K Corp valorizziamo la vostra sicurezza più di ogni altra cosa.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Huh, aspetta... Cosa sta...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Per la salvaguardia di tutti, i disertori in fuga verranno iniettati con una fiala degenerativa secondo il regolamento aziendale. La fiala sarà usata contro di voi nel caso vi allontaniate di 120 metri dall'area di combattimento; siete 49 metri distanti dal perimetro.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: ...Porca trota...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Se non attaccherete il nemico entro 5 secondi, vi verrà somministata una fiala degenerativa in base alle linee guida manageriali. Avete 4 secondi rimanenti.
<Wait, are we... the "enemy" now?>

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Maledizione... Non abbiamo altra scelta...
Why...!

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Io... non voglio essere colpito da una di quelle fiale. Voglio solo vivere...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Rapporto di stato: Nessun disertore individuato, luce verde. Per cortesia, rimanete in fila per ricevere le vostre fiale rigenerative.
…I see.
They're weighing their lives with ours, not unlike what we do. Please permit us to engage.
<...Got it.>
